auth.header: A membership clubb for your business

accountCreated.title: Account Created!
accountCreated.message: Your account has been created successfully. Please check your email to verify your account.

resetPasswordEmailSent.title: Check Your Email!
resetPasswordEmailSent.message: We have sent an email with instructions to reset your password.

resetPasswordSuccess.title: Password Reset Successful!
resetPasswordSuccess.message: Your password has been reset successfully. You will be redirected to the dashboard in a {{secondsLeft}} seconds.

box1.title: Purchase Percentage:
box1.detail: Members will earn {{percentage}}% of their purchase or consumption.

box2.title: Example:
box2.detail: For every {{base}} of consumption, the customer will earn {{earn}} to use in your business.

howToEarn.title: How to earn {{companyName}} points?
howToEarn.p1: Only the collaborators you have assigned will be able to earn or redeem points (Go to My team). From the Clubb mobile app, you must go to the Points section and choose the Earn option, enter the RUT and the amount. That's it!
howToEarn.p2: Check the complementary documentation to define the best way to earn points.

enableRedeem.title: The members of your club will be able to use their accumulated {{companyName}} points to pay.
enableRedeem.subTitle: If you disable redemptions, you will not be able to add new members and your club will be blocked.

box1.title: Redemptions
box1.detail: If the member has {{companyPoints}} {{companyName}} points, they can deduct {{currency}} when paying in your business.

howToRedeem.title: How to redeem {{companyName}} points?
howToRedeem.p1: Only the collaborators you assign will be able to earn or redeem points (Go to My team). From the Clubb mobile app, go to the "Points" section, select "Redeem", enter the RUT and the amount. Then, wait for the member's confirmation on their App. Ready!
howToRedeem.p2: Check the complementary documentation on how redemptions work.

banner.freeApp: Clubb is completely free, you can create your own Clubb and manage it: for free.

errors.general: Ups! Something went wrong, please try again later.

auth.noAccount: Don't have an account? Sign up
auth.alreadyHaveAccount: Already have an account? Sign in

errors.minPasswordLength: Password must be at least 8 characters long
errors.maxPasswordLength: Password must be at most 20 characters long
errors.passwordSpecialChars: Password must contain at least one special character
errors.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter

errors.maxPasswordLength: Password must be at most 20 characters long
errors.passwordSpecialChars: Password must contain at least one special character
errors.passwordUppercase: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter
errors.userAlreadyExists: The email address is already in use

labels.title: You're part of Clubb! Now complete your profile.
labels.emailNotifications: I want to receive email notifications from Clubb

errors.avatarFileType: The file must be an image
errors.avatarFileSize: The file must be less than 5MB
errors.minNameLength: Name must be at least 2 characters long
errors.maxNameLength: Name must be at most 50 characters long
errors.minUsernameLength: Username must be at least 2 characters long
errors.maxUsernameLength: Username must be at most 50 characters long
errors.usernameSpecialChars: Username must not contain special characters, only letters, numbers and underscores
